name: the great british sock off
notes:
welcome to a new season of sock knitter’s anonymous mystery knit-alongs! 

during the month of september, we will be inspired by the great british bake off. each week, you will be presented with a new challenge inspired by delicious baked treats. included with each part of the mystery will be a coordinating recipe! use these to inspire yourself to finish the clues on time, or console yourself if you can’t finish right away. *(all recipes have been given the thumb’s up of approval from the greenethumb family.)*

**sizes:** there are four size options for this pattern. additionally, there will be options on the foot to adjust for your perfect length.

**gauge:** these socks should be knit at the correct gauge to assure a good fit. apparently, i'm a tight knitter and need to use 2.75mm needles to get that gauge. please avoid sorrow, gnashing of teeth, and a trip to the frog pond by using the correct size of needles that will give you the right gauge.

**materials:** unless perhaps you are knitting socks with very long feet, a standard 100 gm/440 yard skein of sock yarn will be sufficient to knit these socks.

**pattern release dates:**
september 1 - part 1
september 8 - part 2
september 15 - part 3
september 22 - part 4
